wine_data_analysis package#

Submodules#

wine_data_analysis.classify_wine_data module#

class wine_data_analysis.classify_wine_data.ClassifyWineData(data)[source]#

Bases: object

logistic_regression()[source]#

Fit a logistic regression model to the training data and predicts classes for the test data.

Returns:
y_prednumpy.ndarray

Predicted classes for the test data.

decision_tree()[source]#

Fit a decision tree classifier to the training data and predicts classes for the test data.

Returns:
y_prednumpy.ndarray

Predicted classes for the test data.

knn()[source]#

Fit a k-nearest neighbors classifier to the training data and predicts classes for the test data.

Returns:
y_prednumpy.ndarray

Predicted classes for the test data.

accuracy(y_pred)[source]#

Compute the accuracy of the classifier.

Parameters:
y_prednumpy.ndarray

Predicted classes for the test data.

Returns:
accfloat

Accuracy of the classifier.

average_precision(y_pred)[source]#

Compute the average precision of the classifier.

Parameters:
y_prednumpy.ndarray

Predicted classes for the test data.

Returns:
avg_precisionfloat

Average precision of the classifier.

average_recall(y_pred)[source]#

Compute the average recall of the classifier.

Parameters:
y_prednumpy.ndarray

Predicted classes for the test data.

Returns:
avg_recallfloat

Average recall of the classifier.

wine_data_analysis.download_wine_data module#

class wine_data_analysis.download_wine_data.DownloadWineData(data_download_path, data_file_name)[source]#

Bases: object

set_cwd()[source]#

Set current working directory to the local path where the data will be stored.

Parameters:
None.
Returns:
None.
download_data()[source]#

Download wine data from url to the specified local path.

Parameters:
None.
Returns:
None.
load_data()[source]#

Load wine data from saved file.

Parameters:
None.
Returns:
dfpandas.core.frame.DataFrame

Downloaded data set with 178 observations and 14 variables (‘class’, ‘alcohol’, ‘malic_acid’, ‘ash’, ‘ash_alcalinity’, ‘magnesium’, ‘phenols_total’, ‘flavanoids’, ‘phenols_nonflavanoid’, ‘proanthocyanins’, ‘color_intensity’, ‘hue’, ‘OD280_OD315’, ‘proline’).

wine_data_analysis.visualize_wine_data module#

class wine_data_analysis.visualize_wine_data.VisualizeWineData(data)[source]#

Bases: object

draw_histograms()[source]#

Draw histograms with additional boxplots for each feature in the dataset (‘class’, ‘alcohol’, ‘malic_acid’, ‘ash’, ‘ash_alcalinity’, ‘magnesium’, ‘phenols_total’, ‘flavanoids’, ‘phenols_nonflavanoid’, ‘proanthocyanins’, ‘color_intensity’, ‘hue’, ‘OD280_OD315’, ‘proline’).

Parameters:
None.
Returns:
matplotlib.plot
draw_boxplots()[source]#

Draw boxplots for each feature in the dataset (‘class’, ‘alcohol’, ‘malic_acid’, ‘ash’, ‘ash_alcalinity’, ‘magnesium’, ‘phenols_total’, ‘flavanoids’, ‘phenols_nonflavanoid’, ‘proanthocyanins’, ‘color_intensity’, ‘hue’, ‘OD280_OD315’, ‘proline’) separated by class.

Parameters:
None.
Returns:
matplotlib.plot
